data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Trongsa, Bhutan with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Trongsa, Bhutan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Trongsa, Bhutan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Trongsa, Bhutan know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 40 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Lord, remember the Bhotia Sikkim people. Make the Bhotia Sikkim people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Please, convict the 40 believers in Trongsa, Bhutan to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Trongsa, Bhutan by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Trongsa, Bhutan to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

location.name: Trongsa
location.people_groups_list: Bodo (Muslim traditions), Kachari Sonwal, Gurung Ghaleg, Gongduk, Adi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bodo (Muslim traditions) (2,700), Kachari Sonwal (1,100), Gurung Ghaleg (10,000), Gongduk (2,400), Adi (2,700)
